definition: to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类

sentences.english: Long grass tickled their legs like creepy crawlies.
sentences.chinese: 長長的草像蠕動的爬蟲使他們腿發癢。

sentences.english: The primitive and uncivilized nature of my life made me feel like a giant reptile during the Cretaceous or Jurassic periods.
sentences.chinese: 其荒莽無文，恍若白堊紀侏羅紀的一隻大爬蟲。
外科醫生救了這條重達60磅的爬蟲。

sentences.english: Many humans think that there are Reptilians upon Earth today.
sentences.chinese: 很多人認爲今天地球上還有爬蟲軍。

sentences.english: Place the bowl where you often see your much despised creepy-crawlies.
sentences.chinese: 把碗放到你常常看見討厭小爬蟲的地方。

sentences.english: Banks Lake is also home to a wide variety of reptiles and birds.
sentences.chinese: 班克斯湖也是極多類爬蟲動物及鳥的家園。

sentences.english: ALEXANDRA: Interesting. Prior to this happening was it strictly the reptilians that were dominating the moon?
sentences.chinese: 很有趣。在此之前，月球是否由爬蟲人嚴密地統治着？

sentences.english: This giant 1)reptile isn"t going to show up in Taiwan"s rivers.
sentences.chinese: 這隻巨大的爬蟲類不會出現在臺灣的河流裏。

sentences.english: All that creepeth upon the earth shall be abominable, neither shall it be taken for meat.
sentences.chinese: 凡地上的爬蟲，都是當憎惡的，都不可喫。

sentences.english: We Pleiadians are associated with the creator gods that are bird like and reptilian.
sentences.chinese: 關於我們昴宿星人聯合像鳥和像爬蟲的衆神創造者。

sentences.english: "We have this very simplistic view of reptiles," said Shine.
sentences.chinese: 我們對爬蟲類動物的認識太過簡單化了。

sentences.english: Why would magnetic energy cause the Greys and Reptilians to become ill?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼磁性能量會讓灰人和爬蟲軍生病？

sentences.english: For many thousands of years, the Reptilians controlled Earth's weather patterns.
sentences.chinese: 長達幾千年之久，爬蟲軍控制着地球的氣候模式。

sentences.english: They are often damp, cold and home to a rich variety of creepy crawlies.
sentences.chinese: 棚屋通常又溼又冷，還充滿了各種各樣的爬蟲。

sentences.english: "We have this very simplistic view of reptiles, " said Shine.
sentences.chinese: 我們對爬蟲類動物的認識太過簡單化了。

sentences.english: Just as all humans are not bad, it is the same with the reptilians .
sentences.chinese: 就像所有的人類都不壞，它是與爬蟲類動物類似。

definition: seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to counter every move/to be full of tricks
